4.title: Angela Robinson

episode of.title: Cinema Conversations with Stephen P. Jarchow (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Host Stephen Jarchow chats with award-winning writer/director Angela Robinson, whose credits include D.E.B.S, Herbie Fully Loaded, The L Word, Hung, and True Blood.

5.title: Arthur Seidelman

episode of.title: Cinema Conversations with Stephen P. Jarchow (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Host Stephen Jarchow chats with Arthur Seidelman, an award-winning television, film, and theater director.

6.title: Barry Krost

episode of.title: Cinema Conversations with Stephen P. Jarchow (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Host Stephen P. Jarchow chats with veteran film producer Barry Krost, whose eclectic credits include When a Stranger Calls, Shakes the Clown, What's Love Got to Do with It, and the Donald Strachey Mystery series.

7.title: Cinema Conversations: Brian Trenchard-Smith

episode of.title: Cinema Conversations with Stephen P. Jarchow (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Host Stephen Jarchow interviews Anglo-Australian writer/director Brian Trenchard-Smith, who has earned a cult following with titles such as BMX Bandits, Dead End Drive-In, Leprechaun 3, and In Her Line of Fire.

1.title: Cinema Conversations: John Moffitt

episode of.title: Cinema Conversations with Stephen P. Jarchow (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Host Stephen P. Jarchow chats with television director and producer John Moffitt, whose credits include The Ed Sullivan Show, The Emmy Awards, Mr. Show, and stand-up comedy specials featuring Bill Maher, Ricky Gervais, Colin Quinn, and Jim Jefferies.

2.title: Cinema Conversations: Stephanie Miller

episode of.title: Cinema Conversations with Stephen P. Jarchow (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Host Stephen Jarchow chats with nationally syndicated radio talk show host, political commentator, comedian, and actress Stephanie Miller.

3.title: Cinema Conversations: Bruce Vilanch

episode of.title: Cinema Conversations with Stephen P. Jarchow (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Host Stephen Jarchow chats with Emmy Award-winning comedy writer, songwriter and actor Bruce Vilanch, whose credits include Hollywood Squares and numerous televised awards shows.

4.title: Cinema Conversations: Sam Irvin

episode of.title: Cinema Conversations with Stephen P. Jarchow (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Host Stephen Jarchow chats with director and producer Sam Irvin, whose credits include Dante's Cove, From Here on OUT, Guilty As Charged, and Gods and Monsters.

imdb.plot outline: Join host Stephen P. Jarchow as he sits down for an up close and personal conversation with some of the most talented and accomplished individuals in the world of motion pictures today. From producers and directors to actors and writers, each interview provides a rare glimpse into the inspiration and perseverance of these talented and accomplished individuals as they tell their stories and present their dedication to the art of cinema.
imdb.title: Cinema Conversations with Stephen P. Jarchow
akas: Cinema Conversations with Stephen P. Jarchow (United States)
plot: Join host Stephen P. Jarchow as he sits down for an up close and personal conversation with some of the most talented and accomplished individuals in the world of motion pictures today. From producers and directors to actors and writers, each interview provides a rare glimpse into the inspiration and perseverance of these talented and accomplished individuals as they tell their stories and present their dedication to the art of cinema.
